> And it\'s my fastest and best controllable plane ???
> 
> 

[http://www.sendspace.com/file/h2eklp](http://www.sendspace.com/file/h2eklp)

No, just no. I am all for radical designs, but the fact that your using mechjeb makes it seem that your aircraft isn\'t balenced right. That plus the astronomical amount of engines per kg of fuel makes yours one of the few aircraft I would actually write something negitive about (I have been holding my lips for a large amount of the aircraft, but they only had a few minor things wrong).
should rename it to the porcupine!
